cleaned_text: Welcome The Wolverhampton Centre for complementary medicine was established in 1991 and continues to provide a diversity of holistic treatments including homoeopathy and acupuncture. How can homoeopathy help me? Homoeopathy is a system of medicine which involves treating the individual with highly diluted substances, given mainly in tablet form, with the aim of triggering the body's natural system of healing. Based on their specific symptoms, a homeopath will match the most appropriate medicine to each patient. How can homoeopathy & acupuncture help me? Both homoeopathy and acupuncture could be of help with: - Skin Problems (Eczema, Psoriasis) - De-pigmentation, Leukoderma) - Smoking/Drug/Alcohol Dependency - Pregnancy - Obesity - Asthma - Depression - Anxiety - Allergies - Menopause - Back/Joint Pain - Sport Injuries Get in touch For further information or to book your FREE introductory session please contact us: - t: 01902 620 622 - f: [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#c9adbbbaa1a8bba4a889bea6a5bfacbba1a8a4b9bda6a7e4a1aae7aaa6e7bca2) Free Introductory Session* Call 01902 620 622 to Book Now *(does not include medication or treatment)
